content:
I think there's something about having a PM conversation on Zulip that feels less personal/immediate than having that same conversation on gmail or facebook chat. Do other people feel this as well?

My hypothesis is that we don't have the animation quite right for sending a PM. Sending to a stream I think is fine, as is receiving a PM.
Thoughts?
Is the animation for sending to PMs currently any different than sending to streams?
I think it's the same, it's just more noticeable to me in PMs.
